<template>
  <tbody>
    <user-item  v-for="(user,index) in userList" :key="index" :user="user"></user-item>
    <!-- <user-item></user-item>
    <user-item></user-item>
    <user-item></user-item>
    <user-item></user-item> -->
  </tbody>
</template>

<script>
import UserItem from "./UserItem.vue";
import { mapState } from 'vuex'
export default {
  components: {
    UserItem,
  },
  // computed:{
  //   userList(){
  //     return this.$store.state.userList
  //   }
  // }
  computed :mapState({
    userList :(state)=>state.userList
  })
};
</script>

<style></style>
